projects.title: Noor and Brothers Ltd.
projects.description: It's a work flow management software (sales, purchase, raw material stock, multilevel product stock, manufacturing management, customer/supplier management, employee management, accounting etc) for a coal tar manufacturing company in Bangladesh. I worked heavily in this project in my job at Haste IT. I was also involved in user requirement analysis and training on how to use the software.

projects.title: Triangle POS & Inventory
projects.description: Triangle POS is an open source Inventory Management with POS System. Developed with Laravel 10, Bootstrap 4 & Livewire 2.0.

projects.title: Kutub Shop
projects.description: Kutub Shop is an ecommerce website focused on selling books. I worked on both frontend and backend in this project for one of my client (Triangle Technologies Ltd.) and it was built with TALL stack in the frontend and backend in Laravel 8.

projects.title: Canbe BD
projects.description: It's a company profile with ecommerce website for a well known medical instrument distributor in Bangladesh. It was one my project based work for a client built with Laravel 8, Bootstrap & Livewire.

projects.title: Jamia Kashiful Uloom
projects.description: It's a madrasa management system (student management, hostel management, admission management, employee management etc) with frontend cms for a well known madrasa in Bangladesh. I worked actively in this project for both frontend and backend in my job at Haste IT.

projects.title: Almodina Battery House
projects.description: It's a work flow management software (sales, purchase, raw material stock, vehicle stock, customer/supplier management, employee management, basic accounting etc) for a auto manufacturing company in Bangladesh. I worked heavily in this project in my job at Haste IT. I was also involved in user requirement analysis and training on how to use the software.

projects.title: Ihyaussunnah Foundation
projects.description: It's a website for welfare foundation in Bangladesh called Ihyaussunnah Foundation. It also has a separate ecommerce module for selling books. The project was from my my client (Triangle Technologies Ltd.) and the backend is built with Laravel 10.
